title: PCI DSS Compliance Audit
description: A GRC analyst must gather evidence to demonstrate compliance with a specific PCI DSS requirement for an upcoming audit.

tasks.description: Identify the specific evidence required for PCI DSS Requirement 8.2 (related to user identification and authentication).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly lists the required evidence, such as password policy documents and screenshots of system settings.

tasks.description: Gather the required evidence from policy repositories and by taking screenshots of the Active Directory configuration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully collects all necessary evidence.

tasks.description: Organize the evidence and upload it to the audit management portal for the auditor to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly prepares and submits the evidence for the audit.
